snippet: Human rights groups have had concerns about protecting activists, particularly in countries where authoritarian governments have been turning to citizen-generated videos to identify dissidents.
abstract: Human rights groups have had concerns about protecting activists, particularly in countries where authoritarian governments have been turning to citizen-generated videos to identify dissidents.

headline.main: YouTube Offers a Way to Blur Faces, Protecting Identities in Videos

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
